translations.This element is not shared with any user: Kipengele hiki hakishirikiwi na mtumiaji yeyote ambaye ameidhinishwa kukiidhinisha
translations.Approval has already been requested with: Uidhinishaji tayari umeombwa na sheria hii kwa faili hii
translations.You are not authorized to request with t: Huna idhini ya kuomba na sheria hii
translations.Please check my approval request: Tafadhali angalia ombi langu la idhini
translations.Let users approve or reject files: Ruhusu watumiaji waidhinishe au wakatae faili
translations.Approve/reject files based on workflows:
Idhinisha/katata faili kulingana na utendakazi unaofafanuliwa na wasimamizi.

**Onyo**: Muunganisho wa DocuSign si sehemu tena ya programu hii
na inaweza kusakinishwa kwa [programu hii](https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/integration_docusign).
translations.Pending tag is already used in another w: Lebo inayosubiri tayari inatumika katika mtiririko mwingine wa kazi
translations.Approval workflow saved: Mtiririko wa kazi wa idhini umehifadhiwa
translations.Approval workflow deleted: Uidhinishaji wa mtiririko wa kazi umefutwa
translations.Each workflow defines who (which users,: Kila mtiririko wa kazi unafafanua ni nani (ni watumiaji gani, vikundi au miduara) wanaweza kuidhinisha faili za lebo fulani inayosubiri na ni lebo ipi iliyoidhinishwa/iliyokataliwa inapaswa kukabidhiwa.
translations.A list of users/groups/circles who can m: Orodha ya watumiaji/vikundi/miduara ambao wanaweza kuomba idhini wenyewe inaweza kubainishwa kwa hiari.
translations.To be considered approved, a file/direct: Ili kuzingatiwa kuwa imeidhinishwa, faili/saraka iliyo na lebo nyingi ambazo hazijashughulikiwa lazima iidhinishwe na mtiririko wote wa kazi unaohusika.
translations.You can chain approval workflows by usin: Unaweza kuratibu mtiririko wa uidhinishaji wa kazi kwa kutumia lebo inayosubiri kama lebo iliyoidhinishwa/iliyokataliwa katika mtiririko mwingine wa kazi.
translations.All tags must be different in a workflow: Lebo zote lazima ziwe tofauti katika mtiririko wa kazi. Lebo inayosubiri inaweza kutumika tu katika mtiririko mmoja wa kazi.
translations.Remove file approval when file is modifi: Ondoa idhini ya faili wakati faili inarekebishwa
translations.What is the purpose of this workflow?: Ni nini madhumuni ya mtiririko huu wa kazi?
translations.There is no approval workflow allowing y: Hakuna mtiririko wa kazi wa idhini unaokuruhusu kuomba idhini.
translations.Select approval workflow: Chagua mtiririko wa kazi wa idhini
translations.File will be automatically shared with e: Faili itashirikiwa kiotomatiki na kila mtu anayeruhusiwa kuidhinisha.
translations.Failed to get approval pending files: Imeshindwa kupata idhini ya faili zinazosubiri
translations.Waiting for authorized users to approve: Inasubiri watumiaji walioidhinishwa kuidhinisha faili hii
